DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, randomly upgrade #b3 cards in your deck and choose #b1 card to remove from your deck.

SuzuranKhas:SixTails.NAME: Six Tails
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain [E].

SuzuranKhas:ThreeTails.NAME: Three Tails
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #ysuzurankhas:foxfire. At the start of each turn, draw #b1 additional card.
